Title: The More Things Change (2)
Plot: Kris sneaks back into town to watch Wildfire in a race. Junior sees her in the barn with Wildfire. Dani and Kris become friends, and Dani lets Kris stay at her new clinic. Junior is struggling to decide if he should propose to his girlfriend, Laura.
GuestStars: Sheila Ivy Traister, John Terry, William Russ
